sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Box, Container, Typography, Button, Grid, Card, CardContent, CardActions, Paper, List, ListItem, ListItemIcon, ListItemText, } from '@mui/material'; import { Agriculture, People, Work, Chat, TrendingUp, Security, Speed, Support, Groups, LocalShipping, Campaign, } from '@mui/icons-material'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import DecorPicker from '../components/DecorPicker'; import DecorSection from '../components/DecorSection'; import { Fab } from '@mui/material'; import { Add } from '@mui/icons-material'; const HomePage: React.FC = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const storageKey = 'decor-home'; const [decor, setDecor] = useState([]); const [pickerOpen, setPickerOpen] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { try { const saved = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(storageKey) || '[]'); if (Array.isArray(saved)) setDecor(saved); } catch {} }, []); const handleAddDecor = (urls: string[]) => { const updated = [...decor, ...urls]; setDecor(updated); localStorage.setItem(storageKey, JSON.stringify(updated)); }; const features = [ { icon: , title: 'Smart Matching', description: 'AI-powered matching between farmers and skilled laborers', }, { icon: , title: 'Task Management', description: 'Efficiently manage agricultural tasks and assignments', }, { icon: , title: 'AI Assistant', description: '24/7 AI-powered agricultural guidance and support', }, { icon: , title: 'Secure Payments', description: 'Safe and reliable payment processing system', }, { icon: , title: 'Middlemen Network', description: 'Centralized coordinators to mobilize labour quickly', }, { icon: , title: 'Tractor Hire', description: 'Rent tractors by fare or nearest distance', }, { icon: , title: 'Announcements', description: 'Govt circulars, weather alerts and market news', }, ]; const benefits = [ 'Connect with verified agricultural workers', 'Post jobs and find skilled labor instantly', 'AI-powered recommendations for optimal matches', 'Real-time notifications and updates', 'Secure payment processing', '24/7 AI chat support', ]; return ( {/* Hero Section */} ðŸŒ¾ AgriConnect Connecting Farmers with Skilled Agricultural Workers The modern platform that bridges the gap between farmers and laborers
AI-powered matching and seamless task management. {/* Image highlight strip */} {[ 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1500937386664-56f3d81aa8cf?auto=format&fit=crop&w=900&q=60', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1519003300449-424ad0405076?auto=format&fit=crop&w=900&q=60', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1500530855697-b586d89ba3ee?auto=format&fit=crop&w=900&q=60', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1516637090014-cb1ab0d08fc7?auto=format&fit=crop&w=900&q=60', ].map((src, idx) => ( ))} {/* User-added decorative items */} {/* Features Section */} Why Choose AgriConnect? Built with modern technology to serve the agricultural community {features.map((feature, index) => ( {feature.icon} {feature.title} {feature.description} ))} {/* Benefits Section */} For Farmers Find skilled agricultural workers when you need them most {benefits.slice(0, 3).map((benefit, index) => ( ))} Join Our Community Over 10,000 farmers and workers already connected setPickerOpen(true)}> setPickerOpen(false)} onAdd={handleAddDecor} /> {/* For Workers Section */} Find Your Next Job Discover opportunities that match your skills For Agricultural Workers Connect with farmers and grow your career {benefits.slice(3).map((benefit, index) => ( ))} {/* CTA Section */} Ready to Get Started? Join thousands of farmers and workers who are already using AgriConnect
Streamline your agricultural operations today! ); }; export default HomePage;
